skills.name: Uppercut
skills.description: Strikes and provokes the enemy for 1 turn with a 50% chance.
skills.level_progress_description:
Effect Rate +5%
Damage +5%
Effect Rate +5%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +15%

skill_effect.name: Provoke
skill_effect.description: The monster is forced to only attack the monster which applied the effect

skills.name: Strike
skills.description: Slams the enemy to deal damage. This attack will deal more damage according to your MAX HP.
skills.multiplier_formula: 3.0*<mark>ATK</mark> + 0.15*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Attacker's HP in raw hit points">MAX HP</mark>

skills.name: Triple Uppercut
skills.description: Throws 3 strong uppercuts at an enemy. Each attack has a 15% chance to stun the enemy for 1 turn.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +10%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Effect Rate +20%

skill_effect.name: Multiple Hits
skill_effect.description: Attack hits more than 1 time per use.

skill_effect.name: Stun
skill_effect.description: Enemy is stunned and immobilized for a number of turns
